<title level="1" right="Action">[Vital Shot](/Actions.aspx?ID=916) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 110</row>

</column>

---

Your careful shot against an unsuspecting opponent pierces a vital artery or organ. Make a ranged Strike. If the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), the Strike deals an extra die of weapon damage, and the foe takes [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to the amount of precision damage from your [One Shot, One Kill](/Actions.aspx?ID=915).
name: Vital Shot
